text:
Dirk (Dick) Dolman (2 July 1935 – 23 January 2019) was a Dutch politician. In 1970, he became a member of the House of Representatives as a member of the Labour Party (PvdA).
From 17 July 1979 to 14 September 1989 he was the Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Dolman was born in Empe (Gelderland) and died at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the House of Representatives
